projects.name: slide
projects.description: Real-time communication app for anonymous text and video chat. Allows user to connect with strangers based on shared interest.

projects.name: Suleat
projects.description: Social app for sharing food taste and experience. Collaborated within an agile team following Scrum methodologies to successfully deliver the client's needs.

projects.name: Palatable
projects.description: Restaurant review app. Worked with a team to develop a dynamic robust web application. Implemented functionality for user authentication, profile management, reviews, voting, and search.

projects.name: 2DFA Simulation
projects.description: Two-way accepter machine simulation following Dexter Kozen's 2DFA principles. Developed the simulation engine to process user-input strings, with options for step-by-step or fast-run simulation.

projects.name: Stock Portfolio Management App
projects.description: Stock portfolio management web application with real-time stock data retrieval from IEX API and portfolio tracking.
